bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: George Marton was a writer and literary agent from Budapest who lived and worked in Vienna, Paris, London, New York, and Hollywood. He died in 1979 at age 80.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains an autobriography with chapters on Franz Werfel and Thomas Mann in exile written by George Marton.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is unprocessed and is likely disorganized. Individual items may be difficult to find.
